name: I Don't Want To Be a Hero!
name_original: I Don't Want To Be a Hero!
description:
A Twine branching narrative where you, the chosen one, embark on a journey to escape your responsibility to save the world.

There’s always the moral choices you make in some games. This branching narrative is somewhat of a more comical approach to that stereotype, except in this game rewards the player from running away from responsibilities versus accepting one’s duty as the Hero or Chosen One. 

This game is an experimental linked based game made in Twine for a Foundations of Video Game Design course at UC Santa Cruz. 

Release Date: Feb 10, 2019
